Take a look at the Artheon VR Museum!

Here's a look at an incredible project happening in the ThreeFold universe!

09 December 2020  · 

The Artheon Virtual Reality Museum allows visitors to explore and interact with hundreds of thousands of pieces of fine art, with or without a VR headset!

Take a tour here.

Artheon will soon be hosted on top of the ThreeFold Grid, serviced by Green Edge.

For early access and information, please join the Artheon Telegram group here.

partnerproject

DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid

The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.
